comments:
Build number:v2.2.0 20070316

Description:
If user dosen't select the report node, NPE exception occured while open or save report in sample report view.

Step to reporduce:
1. open the sample report view
2. select a file folder node and click save or open button

Actual result:
NPE exception occured.
